articles.content:
DPRK Premier Congratulates New Indian PM
    Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a congratulatory message to Manmohan Singh on his assumption as prime minister of the Republic of India.
 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between two countries would grow stronger and develop as required by the new century, he sincerely wished the new Indian prime minister great success in his responsible work to build powerful and prosperous new India.
